export async function readPackage({cwd = process.cwd(), normalize = true} = {}) {
    const filePath = path.resolve(cwd, 'package.json');
    const json = parseJson(await fsPromises.readFile(filePath, 'utf8'));

    if (normalize) {
        normalizePackageData(json);
    }

    return json;
}
